description.value:
You unleash energy from the broken connection to your patron. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] from creatures beyond the edge of the emanation but can't use that concealment to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide]. Any creature that begins its turn in the emanation is affected based on your patron's tradition.

  • Arcane Raw energy and magical formulae circulate around you. A creature that begins its turn in the emanation gains weakness 1 to spell damage for 1 round.
  • Divine Divine power crashes in a cycle of life and death. A living or undead creature that begins its turn in the emanation gains 2 temporary Hit Points for 1 round. This effect has the spirit trait.
  • Occult Esoteric symbology etches the air. An allied creature that begins its turn in the emanation has lesser cover while inside the emanation, and for 1 round after it leaves.
  • Primal Plants and fungus symbolic of your patron constantly grow and wither in the emanation. A creature that begins its turn in the emanation has a â€“10-foot status penalty to all its Speeds for 1 round or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape]{Escapes}. This effect has the fungus, plant, and wood traits.

Heightened (+1) An arcane manifestation increases its weakness by 1 and a divine manifestation increases its temporary Hit Points by 2.
